name: Ashen
description: Ashen is an action RPG about a wanderer in search of a place to call home. This is a world where nothing lasts, no matter how tightly you cling to it. Players may cross paths with one another, and choose to guide those they trust to their camp, encouraging them to rest at the fire and perhaps remain. When someone joins your settlement, they come with unique skills and crafting abilities to bolster your chances of survival. Together, you might just stand a chance.
